events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineering position at our company. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience and skills in software development.
A recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out to guide you through the next steps of our process.
Your profile has passed the initial screening stage. You demonstrate strong potential and your background aligns well with our software engineering requirements.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions. Your detailed answers have helped us better understand your technical skills and motivations.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead software engineer for May 8th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your coding experience and problem-solving approach.
